import React, { useState} from 'react' import { Button, Form } from 'react-bootstrap' import FormContainer from '../components/FormContainer' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import {saveShippingAddress} from '../actions/cartActions' const ShippingScreen = ({history}) => { const cart = useSelector(state => state.cart) const {shippingAddress} = cart const [address, setAddress] = useState(shippingAddress.address) const [city, setCity] = useState(shippingAddress.city) const [postalCode, setPostalCode] = useState(shippingAddress.postalCode) const [country, setCountry] = useState(shippingAddress.country) const dispatch = useDispatch() const submitHandler = (e) =>{ e.preventDefault() dispatch(saveShippingAddress()) } return (

Shipping

Address setAddress(e.target.value)}> City setCity(e.target.value)}> PostalCode setPostalCode(e.target.value)}> Country setCountry(e.target.value)}>
) } export default ShippingScreen
